vehicles.description: a white sedan directly in front of the ego vehicle
vehicles.explanation: its position dictates the following distance and speed adjustment for the ego car

vehicles.description: multiple vehicles in adjacent lanes and ahead, some with brake lights on, indicating potential slow-moving or stopped traffic
vehicles.explanation: indicates that the ego car may need to adjust speed or lane position in response to traffic flow and keep a safe following distance

traffic cones.description: A series of orange traffic cones are positioned on the road to the right side of the ego car, separating its lane from the right-most lane and indicating a lane closure or a potential road hazard.
traffic cones.explanation: The ego car must stay within its lane boundaries and avoid the closed lane on the right, thus not making any lane changes towards the right.

suggestions: The ego car should maintain a safe following distance from the silver sedan ahead, be prepared for a potential stop or slowdown, and be vigilant of surrounding traffic which may behave unpredictably due to the lane taper indicated by the traffic cones.
